headline: Amazon to spend up to $50 billion on AI infrastructure for U.S. government
summary: The project will add 1.3 gigawatts of capacity across new data centers, with Amazon expected to break ground in 2026.

headline: 6 tips for selecting a senior-living community for yourself or a loved one
summary: How an industry expert helped his retired parents pick a new place to live.

headline: Jim Cramer: This stock will skyrocket if its chips are approved for China sales
summary: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.

headline: Meta’s stock finds a new defender, who predicts 30% upside from here
summary: A BNP analyst says Meta’s AI spending is necessary from a competitive standpoint — and will eventually pay off.

headline: Trump’s healthcare plan could be revealed today. Here’s what we know so far.
summary: President Donald Trump looks on track to offer a healthcare plan that addresses expiring Obamacare subsidies, the issue that triggered this fall’s record-breaking government shutdown.

headline: We're buying more shares of this cybersecurity giant after a tough post-earnings stretch
summary: The stock has tumbled since the company reported earnings last Wednesday evening, despite a clean beat and raise.

headline: Latest Oil Market News and Analysis for November 24
summary: Oil dropped after posting the biggest weekly loss since early October, as traders weighed the prospect of a Ukraine-Russia peace deal that could increase crude flows into an already well-supplied market.
